The shaking suddenly stops. Silence reigns in the base, and some wire 
start smoking at the base of the CR. A small electrical arc runs 
along the surface.

Then, as fast as a lightning, a blue proton blade slices the CR open 
in a semi-circle, then fades as quickly as it appeared. But it is not 
over.

Before anyone has time to react, the metal panel is blown open and a 
fearsome AzureBlade slowly and methodically comes out...

> : : Rodimus Prime : :

violently.
